question: 車内
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>car</kanji> <kanji>inside</kanji> is simply that, <vocabulary>inside the car</vocabulary>. This can be used for other means of transport too, so it can also mean <vocabulary>inside the train</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>inside the bus</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
